search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for PandaDoc (pandadoc.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official PandaDoc pricing page is: [https://www.pandadoc.com/pricing/](https://www.pandadoc.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: PandaDoc Pricing Options that Work For Your Needs

extracted_content.content:
PandaDoc Pricing Options that Work For Your Needs
===============
        

![Image 2: Cpq For Salesforce](blob:http://localhost/fa8f1311b8235dc91ea2e8b2589afa9e)

Introducing PandaDoc CPQ for Salesforce. Accurate quotes, every time. [Learn more](https://www.pandadoc.com/integrations/crm/salesforce-cpq/)

Simple, scalable pricing
========================

No extra charges. No hidden fees.

### Personal

For basic e-signature needs

$10 USD Seat cost per month

[Start a free trial](https://signup.pandadoc.com/?plan=rec_plans_v5_essentials_an&ss=pricing-page_pricing_pricing_personal&lng=en-US)No credit card required

Key features:

1.  Five agreements per month with secure e-sign
    
2.  Drag-and-drop editor for media rich documents
    

### Starter

For quickly creating and signing forms and agreements.

$19 USD Seat cost per month

[Start a free trial](https://signup.pandadoc.com/?plan=rec_plans_v5_essentials_an&ss=pricing-page_pricing_pricing_essentials&lng=en-US&__hstc=216515849.50dd2697c9ac01d317b56b7bc2fdb9ae.1711551245649.1741710431568.1741794919499.378&__hssc=216515849.2.1741794919499&__hsfp=964925476)No credit card required

Everything in Personal, plus:

1.  Unlimited document uploads and e‑Signatures
    
2.  Real‑time tracking and notifications
    
3.  24/7 email and chat support
    

### Business

For sales proposals and integrated agreement workflows.

$49 USD Seat cost per month

[Request a demo](https://www.pandadoc.local/getdemo/?plan=rec_plans_v5_business_an&ss=pricing-page_pricing_pricing_business)No credit card required

Everything in Starter, plus:

1.  Custom quotes and sales agreements
    
2.  CRM integrations\*
    
3.  Custom branding and content library
    
4.  Deal rooms
    
5.  Approval workflows
    
6.  Web forms\*
    
7.  Bulk send\*
    

### Enterprise

For end-to-end document workflows and advanced automations.

Let’s talk Per‑seat or per‑document pricing

### Count on us  
to safeguard your data

PandaDoc delivers industry-leading data protection that provides the safeguarding measures you need. SOC 2 Type 2 and GDPR compliance ensures that we handle your sensitive information with integrity and effectiveness. Your data is encrypted in transit, then stored in a SOC, FISMA, and PCI DSS Level 1 compliant cloud. We also perform external audits to identify and prevent potential security breaches.

![Image 14: Security](https://public-site.marketing.pandadoc-static.com/assets/assets/features/security-8188dbc533.png)

Questions? We have answers.
---------------------------

### How is PandaDoc different from eSignature software like DocuSign?

eSignature is just one of PandaDoc’s many features. With PandaDoc you create and manage the entire workflow of all your sales documents from proposals to contracts and gain visibility and insights from the interactions your documents receive from your customers.

### Will I be charged once I start a trial?

Absolutely not. We will only charge you when you decide to use PandaDoc after you’ve completed your evaluation. Your free trial is valid for 14 days.

### Is it free to sign a document?

Absolutely! All of your customers and other recipients of your documents sent from PandaDoc can eSign them for free. Once they receive a PandaDoc document in their inbox, they can sign it on any device without needing a PandaDoc account.

### Can I change my plan later?

Sure! You can upgrade your subscription plan from within your account at any time.

### Can I use PandaDoc on my mobile phone or iPad?

Yes! The PandaDoc mobile app takes the process to create, track, approve, negotiate, and eSign documents on-the-go. Just open the app on your phone or iPad and sign away!
